testcase.classname: US1008 editor cok parametreli giris testi
testcase.name: TC12 editor sayfasina farkli kisileri ekleme
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "editDataTablesURL" sayfasina gider.........................passed Then EDT new bttn basar.....................................................passed And EDT ilgili kutulara "murat" "soner" "TestLead" "Paris" "124" "2021-12-13" "60000".passed And EDT create bttn basar...................................................passed When EDT kullanici "murat soner" ile arama yapar............................passed Then EDT isim bolumunda "murat soner" oldugunu dogrular.....................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
